name: Mutton Gear Solid
description:
Mutton Gear Solid

- Our team's entry for the Mini Jam 97 -

Try to remain sneaky while getting the highest score as you throw your sheep into the air, collide on fences, bushes or peaceful sheep. But be careful, don't let Robert the Shepherd spot you! He seems quite hungry...

How to play

Simply use your mouse! Drag & drop on the screen to send your sheep flying through the field!
(Touchpad is not recommended but might be possible too.)

Our team

Yann Dupont (Old Dry Witch Games) - Game design, programming, music
Emma Neiss (Old Dry Witch Games) - Game design, programming
Marius Roelly (Orkhyd) - Game design, SFX
Louis Hasenfratz (turbolumasse) - Game design, graphical assets

Big thanks to everybody in the team, they did an amazing work!!
We've really outdone ourselves during these three days and we're proud of what we created!

All code and assets were created during the jam's three days, thanks to everybody's hard work!

Leaderboard hosted for free by LootLocker

Hoping you will enjoy the game as much as we enjoyed making it :)
